attributes.additional_details: For the third time in my short life we are about to embark upon an unworthy politically motivated campaign of destruction, our government intends to override the checks and balances put in place precisely to stop governmental abuse of military power. In every conflict we have involved ourselves in since the second world war it has never ended in peace and prosperity for the nation at the end of our warmongering, look at Iraq quite the utopian society envisaged after its invasion in 2003. Please understand the people of the UK are tired of war. No Syrian intervention.
